website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful timepiece at a price that's surprising considering all it has to offer – our choice for the best pocket watch for the budget-conscious shopper.
pros: Black-tone metal, blue Roman numerals and hands, and skeleton design that allows you to see its inner workings give this mechanical model a truly unique look, while the construction has a sturdy feel
cons: The downside of the eclectic design is that the watch face is somewhat difficult to read
Every day winding is required, but it's easy to do

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece. Much better quality than I expected for the price. You do need to push the button to close it as well as open it but that is the only real functional detraction. Visually it is just stunning. The deep blue numerals and hands make this piece appear much more substantial than I was expecting and it is a hefty little piece making it look and feel like a much more expensive item. Having just received it, I cannot speak to durability of the mechanism or the finish but for the price, I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shotgun

customer_reviews.title: There are problems
customer_reviews.text: I love mechanical pocket watches and have used one for years. Unfortunately, a while back it stopped winding. I decided to buy this watch as sort of a temporary thing, and also because I love the steampunk design, until I could get the other watch (which had lasted me 8 years without servicing before it stopped winding, and that was with long stretches of time where it was continuously running). However, I still love the style of this watch. Also, it is an $18 pocket watch, which is very inexpensive for mechanical pocket watches, so I cannot say I was that shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Edwards

customer_reviews.title: So surprisingly! Exactly as the picture of the web shows!
customer_reviews.text: So surprisingly! Exactly as the picture of the web shows!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool design and function
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo saw a pocketwatch in a movie and thought it was 'awesome cool' so I decided to shop for one. He has never remotely experienced a timepiece that was entirely mechanical driven, no need to recharge. The glass front and pack allows him to see the flywheel spinning and all the cogs and gears. Only drawback is the face and numbers are colored the same, as well as the hands, so can be hard to read in anything but optimal light. Regardless, the cobalt blue is his favorite color and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking mechanical wind up pocket watch! Battery free, will always be able to keep the time...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pocket watch! very good looking watch, i like the blue face and inset alot. Most of all I like the fact that it is a mechanical watch, no betteries needed. I had been looking for a wind up watch for years, and found this one on sale for only $7.99 and worth every penny! I would recommend this pocket watch for anyone in the market for one, especially one that winds up. It's a great looking pocket watch, and can see thru the back side also. I also wantedd a watch i could use in case the SHTF one day, and I won't need to forage for batteries to keep my timepeice running...
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Very cool little picket watch for cheap. Looks nice and my daughter loved it. Feels sturdy, though I can't say how much so, as my kiddo put it in a necklace chain and doesn't wear it super often, so it doesn't get daily wear. For occasional wear though, it's holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: Too Dark!
customer_reviews.text: nice metal through and through, i like the design and color choices; however I do have a couple issues. One: it's a plastic covering over the watch part, which makes it feel a bit cheap if you end up touching it. it'd be cooler if it were glass. this is relatively minor, though. doesn't really bother me. Two: This is a bit of an issue though, the chosen shade of blue for the numerals is very dark especially contrasted with the black background, it makes it really hard to see what time it is, even in good lighting.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but this image doesn't represent how dark it is. Don't get me wrong, it's a nice piece. I wish it was a little lighter accent finish on the gears, it would highlight them much better. It's a windup watch which I never even thought about. It is very dark though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work! Dont buy it!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of #$@%! The first one stopped working after a week. Sent it back and got a new one and this one wont keep time. Its disappointing because it is so cool looking. Now my Son is disappointed with his Christmas gift and I feel bad. Good job morons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is more of an art piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it had a luminescent dial. Received it today and I could hardly tell the time. Dark blue and black are beautiful but too dark for a dial that does not light up. I'm buying another one with a lighter background color or with a light up dial.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: ... now i have a working watch that looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: After the issues with the first watch the seller got in contact with me right away and fixed the issues without any problems so now i have a working watch that looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lasting quality and beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice and solid. It has a beautiful design. The blue inside is very vibrant. I gave this as a gift in 2017 and it is still going strong in 2019. I would say it is fairly durable. It loses a star for the following reasons. The door seems weak which makes me fear it will break. The chain feels super cheap im comparison to the watch itself which looks decent in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Watch lasted less than a month
customer_reviews.text: This Pocket Watch was operable for less than one month. The stem mechanism broke and it now prevents the time from set and the watch from being wound. I am thoroughly disappointed with this watch. I can't find instructions for returning it. Buy this watch at your risk!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful piece of work very very satisfied customer it is ...
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of work very very satisfied customer it is truly a cool item to have the only negative is I didn't think it was going to be so small it is very very small it would have gotten 5 stars and higher and you probably would get more customers buying it if it was at least the size of my palm it is the size of 2inches over all. But like I said before what a beautiful amazing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nzinga

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our teenage son who had been wanting one. He loved it. The only thing he doesnt like is having to wind it all the time. He said its hard to tell how long he needs to wind it for. He carried it around for about 3 months and now its just sitting on his desk.
customer_reviews.author: A...

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my boyfriend originally for his Gomez costume for this upcoming Halloween. We both love it so much, we are already trying to use it more often. (Bonnie and Clyde? LOL) The whole thing is just gorgeous!!! and it got here very quickly and was packaged very very nicely. it was the first thing I looked for in my big box of orders that it came in. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch so much. The frontal piece that covers the clock Jada is plastic but you get what you pay for. It is a little fragile so if you feel a slight pull on the chain because it got stuck somewhere don’t try to pull until it comes out because it will break that’s what happened to me sadly. But it is such a cool watch. Also it has to be would by a person unless mine was broken but that’s a different story. Over all this is a great watch and I really think it’s so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Wuerzinger

customer_reviews.title: Needs a heavier chain
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool looking watch. The numbers on the face is great except for the IV which is written as IIII. The watch itself seems made to last and easy to use. The chain was light weight and broke too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Big IV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to explain how beautiful this is. The pictures dont do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cool looking pocket watch, but the hands were hard to read unless you were in a very bright area, would be a nice show piece though. I did return it and amazon refunded my money easily.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: Clock face cover is plastic not glass. Glare makes blue clock face difficult to see/read. Wind up. But good looking design.
customer_reviews.author: Customer0646601

customer_reviews.title: Great Creftmanship at a very good price.  You get a lot for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it is a wind up watch. The design is beautifully crafted and sturdy. The blue hands/numbers are a little hard to read at first, but once you get used to it, it is fine. Am very happy I purchased this for my wife for fathers day.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great price and BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful pocket watch!! Fantastic price! Only downfall is it doesn't come with winding directions.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele H

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: mine lasted six mouths of daily use then stopped working. it was a great conversation piece while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: D'vo

customer_reviews.title: Everyone really liked this watch I got lots of complements
customer_reviews.text: Everyone really liked this watch I got lots of complements. It went well with the costume I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: S. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Wasn’t as bright of a blue as the picture but still gorgeous. Can’t wait to gift this to my bf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift - cute watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She LOVED it. My only complaint was that it didn't come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, great colors and mechanics worked great when I wound (no more than 20 turns) it up to see it run. Just bummed that ring on top of the crown was broken and I had to return it. Not enough time to buy it again for my event.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Benhoff-Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks nice. Only problem is the numbers are a bit difficult to read in low light.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great looking watch I would only warn buyers against over-winding ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking watch I would only warn buyers against over-winding it as I did, causing it to break. I'm really bummed by my mistake but will definitely be purchasing another. Just read the instructions 😃

customer_reviews.title: nice watch

customer_reviews.title: Look cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pocket watch. It looks amazing and I think my brother will love it. I cant wait to give it to him for Christmas this year.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: i enjoyed this watch a lot. it is a very slick and interesting design. the background blue is a bit dark for the black hands to make it easy to read, but it isnt bad. only problem is i dropped it one time and it no longer functions...working on a fix currently.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: It is of good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and cool looking

customer_reviews.title: Great Groomsmen Gift

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased for my granddaughter. It is beautiful and works well. This was her favorite gift. She absolutely loves it!

customer_reviews.title: It's TIME for something perfect

customer_reviews.title: An awesome buy

I expected a shot door, toy like texture, shotty engravings, and time is off all the time. But nope, very well done.

customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the watch, but they messed up the numbre 4. Roman numeral for 4 is iv not iiii.

customer_reviews.author: #boymom

customer_reviews.title: Broke within hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it looked so great. It stopped ticking and when I tried to wind it up again the crown unscrewed and now it won't wind, despite me screwing the crown back in. Two stars because it still looks really good, but doesn't really work that well.

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: Even after you wind it, it stops almost immediately. Beautiful watch, just doesn't work properly

customer_reviews.title: Ran fine at first than broke.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and ran fine at first, 2nd or 3rd time I had to wind the watch it broke and I can no longer wind it. If I try it only changes the time. Unfortunately I missed the return window due to my own fault and now have a watch that doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a couple of weeks then the blue, decorative foil started to peel away from the face and snagged the second hand - stopping it cold.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!

customer_reviews.title: Broken

customer_reviews.title: Get the white face, easier to see

You have to tilt it back and forth just to read the time I gotta say the photographer did a good job of advertising though.
